Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: usane socha aur atakal se ek baat banaee
to vinasht ho, kaisee baat banaee
phir vinasht ho, kaisee baat banaee
phir nazar daudaee
phir tyoree chadhaee aur munh banaaya
phir peeth pheree aur ghamand kiya
antatah bola, "yah to bas ek jaadoo hai, jo pahale se chala aa raha hai
yah to maatr manushy kee vaanee hai.
main sheeghr hee use saqar (jahannam kee aag) mein jhonk doonga
aur tumhen kya pata kee saqar kya hai
vah na taras khaegee aur na chhodegee
khaal ko jhulasa denevaalee hai
usapar unnees (kaaryakarta) niyukt hai

aur hamane us aag par niyukt rahanevaalon ko farishte hee banaaya hai, aur hamane unakee sankhya ko inakaar karanevaalon ke lie museebat aur aazamaish hee banaakar rakha hai. taaki ve log jinhen kitaab pradaan kee gaee thee poorn vishvaas praapt karen, aur ve log jo eemaan le aae ve eemaan mein aur aage badh jaen. aur jin logon ko kitaab pradaan kee gaee ve aur eemaanavaale kisee sanshay me na pade, aur taaki jinake dilon me rog hai ve aur inakaar karanevaale kahen, "is varnan se allaah ka kya abhipraay hai?" is prakaar allaah jise chaahata hai pathabhrasht kar deta hai aur jise chaahata hain sammaarg pradaan karata hai. aur tumhaare rab kee senaon ko svayan usake siva koee nahin jaanata, aur yah to manushy ke lie maatr ek shiksha-saamagree hai
kuchh nahin, saakshee hai chaand
aur saakshee hai raat jabaki vah peeth pher chukee
aur praatahkaal jabaki vah poornaroopen prakaashit ho jae.
nishchay hee vah bhaaree (bhayankar) cheezon mein se ek hai
manushyon ke lie saavadhaanakarta ke roop mein
tumamen se us vyakti ke lie jo aage badhana ya peechhe hatana chaahe
pratyek vyakti jo kuchh usane kamaaya usake badale rehan (giravee) hai
sivaay daenvaalon ke
ve baagon mein honge, poochh-taachh kar rahe honge
aparaadhiyon ke vishay mein
tumhe kya cheez sakanr (jahannam) mein le aaee
ve kahenge, "ham namaaz ada karanevaalon mein se na the.
aur na ham muhataaj ko khaana khilaate the
aur vyarth baat aur kath-hujjatee mein pade rahanevaalon ke saath ham bhee usee mein lage rahate the.
aur ham badala die jaane ke din ko jhuthalaate the
yahaan tak ki vishvasaneey cheez (pralay-divas) mein hamen aa liya.
